body: frame house at 26 Harbor View Court in the New Brighton section of Staten Island and wonders when all the decorating will be completed. The plumbing works, the heating is in order and flowers are blooming in the yard, but the living room is still furnished in Early University. It has been three years since Mrs. Poitras, 27 years old, a part-time
title: PURCHASING CITY HOMES AT AUCTION

body: In the days and weeks ahead private homes, apartments and landmarks around the city and in neighboring areas will have welcome mats out for spring house tours. Private Houses Sunday, April 29: A half-dozen well- known Greenwich Village residents, from Grove Street to West Street, will give you a chance to see their homes during the West Village
title: SPRING HOUSE TOURS IN CITY AND NEARBY
